dataset.title: CGR01 Sweep Sampling of Grasshoppers on Konza Prairie LTER Watersheds in 1981 Only

address.deliveryPoint: 116 Ackert Hall, Division of Biology, Kansas State University

section.para: Sweep samples for estimating grasshopper (Acrididae) composition and relative abundance at one site for each of 12 Konza Prairie LTER fire/grazing/soil treatment combinations (3 fire treatments x 2 soils x 2 grazing treatments). Samples were collected in June, August, and September. At each site on each occasion, 18 sets of 10 sweeps each (180 sweeps total) were taken. Stored data include for each site on each occasion: total number of each species (all instars combined) collected and total number for each instar for each species (180 sweeps combined).

dataTable.entityName: CGR011 Data on the environmental variables
dataTable.entityDescription: Data on the environmental variables for grasshopper sampling at each site including soil type, windy speed, ground temperature, relative humidity, and cloudy cover.

attribute.attributeDefinition: row id in file (internal book keeping)
wind speed at start of sampling. mean of 5 measurements at 30 seconds intervals; 5' aboveground
air temperature at start of sampling ground level in shade
relative humidity at ground level in shade at outset of sampling; determined by wet/dry bulb psychrometer
% of cloud cover directly overhead (estimated by eye)

dataTable.entityName: CGR012 Data on the individual number of each grasshopper species
dataTable.entityDescription: Data were on the individual number of each grasshopper species in each sample set. 18 sets were designed at each site and 10 sweeps were taken in each set. This dataset was about the first 10 sets at each sample site.

attribute.attributeDefinition: row id in file (internal book keeping)
total number of individuals all samples

dataTable.entityName: CGR013 Individual number of each grasshopper species in each set
dataTable.entityDescription: Data was recorded on the individual number of each grasshopper species in each set. This dataset was about the set from No.11 to No. 18 set at each sample site.

attribute.attributeDefinition: row id in file (internal book keeping)

dataTable.entityName: CGR014 Data on the individual number of instar and adult stage
dataTable.entityDescription: Data was recorded on the individual number of instar and adult stage. Instars were classified into first, second, third, fourth, and fifth stage.

attribute.attributeDefinition: row id in file (internal book keeping)
number of individuals in first instar
number of individuals in second instar
number of individuals in third instar
number of individuals in fourth instar
number of individuals in fifth instar
total number of indivisuals of all stages

stmml:unit.name: time in military hours and minutes
stmml:unit.id: time in military hours and minutes
